desc:
Please implement the HTML 5 Web Notifications API into VaultWorks. It will enable Trello like "card" notifications for the Vault. When no focus is on the window, display those cards as well as adding the little red number to the flag on top right.

Find more information here, I've tested it and it works nicely:

https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Notification/Using_Web_Notifications
name: VW - Web Notifications
